gameEngine

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameEngine.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable
    Keeps track of player status (location, hit points, etc.) Manages player movement.
    Author:
    Mark Baldwin, Cyndi Rader

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Player.PlayerStatus

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int POINTS_TO_ADVANCE
      The number of points to complete a level.
      static int POINTS_TO_DIE
      The number of hits that can be taken before death.

      • POINTS_TO_DIE

        public static final int POINTS_TO_DIE
        The number of hits that can be taken before death.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • POINTS_TO_ADVANCE

        public static final int POINTS_TO_ADVANCE
        The number of points to complete a level. Player can earn 1 point at a time by interacting with a game piece.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
